Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Mary, Remember me at my last day — two quatrains

BodDou1.First Lines:
Blessed mary moder virginallIntegrate mayden sterre of the
                    see…
BodDou1.Last Lines:
…Whan my soule the body parte froSocoure it frome myn enmyes
                    rage
BodDou1.Attributed Title:
To the glorious virgyn Mary. Quene of heuen and moder of mercy (f.
                        76v)

                    Lyrics.
